solution_line_template: If Yola currently weighs {yola_current_weight} pounds, then Wanda, who weighs {wanda_more_than_yola_current} pounds more than Yola, weighs {yola_current_weight}+{wanda_more_than_yola_current} = <<{yola_current_weight}+{wanda_more_than_yola_current}={wanda_current_weight}>>{wanda_current_weight} pounds.

Wanda also weighs {wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago} pounds more than Yola did 2 years ago, meaning Yola weighed {wanda_current_weight}-{wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago}=<<{wanda_current_weight}-{wanda_more_than_yola_two_years_ago}={yola_weight_two_years_ago}>>{yola_weight_two_years_ago} pounds 2 years ago.
